line.comment: * LU Update (Solarahawk): disabled MDM code
* Get setup
* Return imediately, if already docked at homebase
* Ships located in a sector other than their homebase and fleeing due to damage in action should not jump to homebase immediately, as this would mean almost certain death in combat
* Search for a safe station to move to in current sector; if no station is available, search for a gate to move to
* Try to jump home, if possible (and necessary)
* Check, if THIS has a docking computer aboard
* Return ship to HOMEBASE
* Jump out of loop, when homebase docks shomewhere or does no longer exist
*= [THIS]-> call script 'anarkis.ads.missile.defence' :
* Jump out of loop, when docking computer is removed somehow while flying
* As long as the ship has not reached dock distance, repeat checks
* When ship is below dock distance, teleport it into homebase
* Fighters No docking computer aboard
* Jump out of loop, when homebase docks shomewhere or does no longer exist
*= [THIS]-> call script 'anarkis.ads.missile.defence' :
* Hombase is docked or destroyed
*= [THIS]-> call script 'anarkis.ads.missile.defence' :
* Missile defence end
*[THIS]-> set local variable: name='missile.defense.mosquito.install.version' value=null

sval.val: Return imediately, if already docked at homebase
Ships located in a sector other than their homebase and fleeing due to damage in action should not jump to homebase immediately, as this would mean almost certain death in combat
Search for a safe station to move to in current sector; if no station is available, search for a gate to move to
Try to jump home, if possible (and necessary)
Check, if THIS has a docking computer aboard
Jump out of loop, when homebase docks shomewhere or does no longer exist
Jump out of loop, when docking computer is removed somehow while flying
As long as the ship has not reached dock distance, repeat checks
When ship is below dock distance, teleport it into homebase
Jump out of loop, when homebase docks shomewhere or does no longer exist
